faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.desc: Answers to common questions about our templates, guides and best practices.

items.q: How do I use the UI Kit?
items.a: Download the UI Kit, install the token package, and import the sample components into your app. Start by copying the hero and header patterns.

items.q: Are the performance tips applicable to server-side rendered pages?
items.a: Yes — many tips are generic. Prioritise image optimization, critical CSS and reducing blocking scripts. Server-side rendering benefits from edge caching and CDN rules.

items.q: Can I adapt the templates to other design systems?
items.a: Absolutely — the templates are intentionally minimal and token-driven so you can map them to your design system variables.
Yes — check the Services page to see our engagement models or contact us via the contact form.

faq.title: Frequently asked

items.q: How long does an audit take?
items.a: A lightweight audit typically takes 5–10 business days; deeper audits depend on scope.

items.q: Do you work with existing design systems?
items.a: Yes — we integrate with your tokens and components, and provide migration guidance.
We offer fixed-scope audits, time-and-materials engagements, and bundled discovery + implementation packages.

items.q: How do you handle timezones for distributed teams?
items.a: We coordinate overlapping hours and set clear async updates; our team spans several timezones.
